alert.note: Alert for Goodhue (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 11 at 8:29AM CDT until May 11 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: The National Weather Service in the Twin Cities has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Goodhue County in southeastern Minnesota... * Until 900 AM CDT. * At 829 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Pine Island, or 11 miles northeast of Mantorville, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of south central Goodhue County. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
